707072f-c.text:
Tillary Street, east from Flatbush Avenue Extention. The area in the center, which was formerly the north side of Tillary Street, was cleared of all its buildings in connection with the proposed
construction of Fort Greene Houses.
View 2 shows the south side of the street only, seen across
Flatbush Avenue EXtention.
P. L. Sperr  Views 1,: August 13, 1939
707072f-c.folder: Tillary St. & Gold St., Brooklyn, NY

707073f-a.text:
185-187 Tillary Street, north side, between Gold and Prince Streets.
July 1, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
